title: 求高人解答服务器问题 不惜高分
author: hyx1521
txt_content: 服务器一登录 个别玩家就会出现包里物品消失的问题 但是其他东西还在怎么处理

replies.author: strawmaine
replies.txt_content:
hyx1521 发表于 2012-8-24 01:51 
应该不会消失了   但是也设置不了 出生点了
既然不会消失,那么你的意思是确定问题来源了?
那么好吧:

essentials 的 config.yml
############################################################
# +------------------------------------------------------+ #
# |            Essentials Spawn / New Players            | #
# +------------------------------------------------------+ #
############################################################

newbies:
  # Should we announce to the server when someone logs in for the first time?
  # If so, use this format, replacing {DISPLAYNAME} with the player name.
  # If not, set to ''
  #announce-format: ''
  announce-format: '&dWelcome {DISPLAYNAME}&d to the server!'

  # When we spawn for the first time, which spawnpoint do we use?
  # Set to "none" if you want to use the spawn point of the world.
  spawnpoint: newbies
  
  # Do we want to give users anything on first join? Set to '' to disable
  # This kit will be given reguardless of cost, and permissions.
  #kit: ''
  kit: tools                                       [b]tools改为''[/b]

# Set this to lowest, if you want Multiverse to handle the respawning
# Set this to high, if you want EssentialsSpawn to handle the respawning
# Set this to highest, if you want to force EssentialsSpawn to handle the respawning
respawn-listener-priority: high

# When users die, should they respawn at their first home or bed, instead of the spawnpoint?
respawn-at-home: false
复制代码

replies.author: strawmaine
replies.txt_content: +50字背景描述。。。。

replies.author: hyx1521
replies.txt_content:
strawmaine 发表于 2012-8-23 22:23 
+50字背景描述。。。。
我怀疑可能是我插件冲突的问题?  或者是登录插件的问题嘛 我下载的是最新版xauth 或者是MinecraftRKitPlugin 插件的问题？ 这是一个自动重启插件

replies.author: hyx1521
replies.txt_content:
strawmaine 发表于 2012-8-23 22:23

但是我记得我之前没有弄重启插件的时候也会出现登录后东西没的情况 还有 前几天我还想换authme登录插件 
玩家一登录 物品直接都没了

replies.author: strawmaine
replies.txt_content:
hyx1521 发表于 2012-8-24 00:48 
那怎么关闭呢
取消玩家的essentials.kit权限

replies.author: strawmaine
replies.txt_content:
strawmaine 发表于 2012-8-24 00:50 
取消玩家的essentials.kit权限
你是要对组操作吧。服务器控制台打mangdelp 组名 essentials.kit

replies.author: ayaya
replies.txt_content: ..是不是关闭的时候直接点×然后没有保存...

replies.author: hyx1521
replies.txt_content:
strawmaine 发表于 2012-8-24 00:53 
你是要对组操作吧。服务器控制台打mangdelp 组名 essentials.kit
输入后出现这个
Couldn't retrieve your world. default world 'world' selected
the group doesn't have direct access to that permission

replies.author: strawmaine
replies.txt_content:
hyx1521 发表于 2012-8-24 01:08 
我的权限里面之前也没有加kit啊
你说的“个别玩家”是属于哪个组的？
最好贴上你的plugins\GroupManager\worlds\world\groups.yml内容

replies.author: hyx1521
replies.txt_content:
player 
 Player:
    default: true
    permissions:
    - -bukkit.command.kill
    - essentials.back
    - essentials.back.ondeath
    - essentials.getpos
    - essentials.home
    - essentials.sethome
    - essentials.sethome.others
    - essentials.suicide
    - essentials.tpa
    - essentials.tpaccept
    - essentials.tpahere
    - essentials.tpdeny
    - essentials.warp
    - essentials.warp.list
    - iConomy.help
    - iConomy.holdings
    - iConomy.holdings.others
    - iConomy.payment
    - lockette.user.create.*
    - lwc.protect
    - manage
    - mcmmo.ability.*
    - mcmmo.chat.partychat
    - mcmmo.defaults
    - mcmmo.skills.*
    - remove
    - residence.create
    - sbc.cheats.reicave
    - sbc.cheats.smart-*
    - sbc.radar.reiradar
    - scavenger.exp
    - scavenger.level
    - scavenger.scavenge
    - scs.create.buy
    - scs.create.sell
    - scs.manage
    - scs.remove
    - scs.use
    - worldedit.wand
    - xauth.register
    inheritance:
    - g:groupmanager_default
    - g:bukkit_default
    - g:essentials_default
    - g:towny_builder
    info:
      prefix: '&22B闈掑勾'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
